description: Ten tigers held in a cage lorry by a circus trainer in northern France were taken away, media say.
title: French police seize 10 tigers after mistreatment complaint
title_page: French police seize 10 tigers after mistreatment complaint - BBC News
maintext: The group claimed the tigers were locked up all year round in a cage lorry, with no real protection against the elements, and with barely enough room to go around in circles.
